project.name: Metro Route Calculator
project.description: Representation of the problem as a graph and implementation of Dijkstra's algorithm in the data structure. (C Language)

project.name: Coffee Machine
project.description: Automated coffee machine system coded in Java to manage orders, payments, and deliveries.

project.name: Contagion
project.description: Modeling and design of a mobile application to track the evolution of an epidemic within a population, modeling it as the spread of images within a given population.

project.name: Ecosystem
project.description: Representation of an ecosystem and its properties. Coded in Java, this project aims to model life in nature (prey/predator relationship) and highlight the impact of weather and geography on living beings.

project.name: Real Estate Price Prediction Algorithm
project.description: Linear regression model to predict sale prices using Kaggle data.

project.name: Revolute Deliverable
project.description: Understanding Revolut customers and reducing user churn rate by defining indicators to distinguish active users from inactive users.

job.description: Development of websites and desktop applications for the JOP 2024.
Design of a mobile application for addiction prevention.
